gameDetails.description: Pulp Detective: Expansion 3 – Adventurers, Gadgets, and Nemeses contains 21 new cards (new investigate cards, one gadget card, new nemeses criminal cards), one new die called the blue nemeses die, and a new campaign mode with twelve cases!
